title: 12/17/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/17/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Drew Brees' injury is great news for the Saints

-Playoff expansion will not solve College Football's problem

-Aaron Rodgers shouldn't want to win the MVP

-Playoff predictions if the playoffs started today


Guest: Greg Cosell, NFL Films
